title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover! This versatile and durable kennel is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing a safe and secure space for your beloved pets. Made from galvanized metal iron with a rust-resistant paint-coated finish, this kennel features no sharp edges, ensuring the safety of your furry friends.

The 210D oxford cloth cover is not only waterproof but also windproof and provides much-needed shade from the hot sun. The strong latching swing gate and sturdy latches guarantee the security of your pets. Available in both small and large sizes, this kennel is suitable for dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks.

With easy assembly and excellent ventilation, the BingoPaw Playpen is the perfect solution for pet owners looking for a reliable and comfortable space for their animals. Don't wait, give your pets the space they deserve with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover!

Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover! This durable and versatile playpen is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing a safe and secure space for your beloved pets. 

Made from galvanized metal iron with a paint-coated finish, this kennel is rust-resistant and has no sharp edges, ensuring the safety of your furry friends. The 210D oxford cloth cover is waterproof, windproof, and provides sunshade, protecting your pets from the elements.

With sizes available in both small and large, this playpen is suitable for dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks. The solid latching swing gate and strong latches add an extra layer of security, while the easy assembly panels make installation a breeze.

Give your pets the freedom to play and relax in a comfortable and safe environment with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover. Order yours today!
